name: Introduction to Journalism
description: This course covers the basics of journalism, including the principles of ethical reporting, the fundamentals of writing for a journalistic audience, and the fundamentals of journalistic research.

name: Media Law and Ethics
description: This course covers the various legal and ethical considerations in the field of journalism and media, including defamation, copyright infringement, plagiarism, and more.

name: Writing for Print and Online Media
description: This course covers the fundamentals of writing for print and online media, including grammar, syntax, style, and more.

name: Investigative Reporting
description: This course covers the fundamentals of investigative reporting, including research techniques, developing sources, and how to effectively report on complex topics.
prerequisites: Writing for Print and Online Media

name: Entertainment Journalism
description: This course covers the fundamentals of entertainment journalism, including the basics of reporting on celebrities, events, issues, and the culture at large.
prerequisites: Writing for Print and Online Media
